name: Dodgy Bullets
description:
You are a blue tank in a laboratory of some sort and you have to fight the Zombies that are coming to kill you. Due to the structure of your tank, you can't go on the dark tiles, but Zombies can (and bullets fly)

The more lives you lose, the more out of control your tank becomes, but the world around you changes for your benefit. At 2 lives, the tiles on the top left and bottom right activate, granting you a special item. At 1 live, your bullets will pierce.

But beware, your bullets might start to like the zombies...

The difficulty of the game will change depending on the window size you chose. At smaller sizes, zombies are slower, but you can see less. It's a tradeoff of control over the situation.

How to play:

Move with WASD.
Rotate your cannon with the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys.
Shoot with SPACE (it's possible to hold space).
Pause using ESCAPE.
Toggle fullscreen using F11.

The game was made with the LÖVE game framework.
